org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.reptorsim

Class ReplicaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.reptorsim.ReplicaManager

  • public class ReplicaManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ReplicaManager provides file manipulation methods and interfaces between the Computing Elements and optimisers and the low level Grid infrastructure. It also acts as a wrapper class for the ReplicaCatalogue, so that any changes to it must go through the methods of this class.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

      • replicateFile

        public DataFile replicateFile(DataFile source,
                     StorageElement toSE)
        Copy a file to a SE, and register it in the Replica Catalogue.
        Parameters:
        source - The file we wish to replicate
        toSE - The destination SE
        Returns:
        The new replica if successful, null otherwise

      • copyFile

        public void copyFile(DataFile source,
            StorageElement toSE)
        Copy a file to a SE, but do not register it in the Replica Catalogue. The file is "cached" in the destination SE.
        Parameters:
        source - The file we wish to copy
        toSE - The destination SE

      • deleteFile

        public void deleteFile(DataFile file)
        Delete a DataFile from the Grid, physically deleting it from the Storage Element and unregistering it with the Replica Catalogue.

      • listReplicas

        public DataFile[] listReplicas(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns an array of all the replicas of filename on the Grid.
        Returns:
        Array of DataFiles which are replicas of filename.
